City Council

The City Council is the legislative and governing body of the City of Graham and consists of a mayor and four council members. Council meetings are held Thursdays on a bi-weekly basis at 8:30 am in the Graham Visitor and Business Center, 608 Elm St.

Alex Heartfield

Mayor

Term 1: 5/2024-5/2026

Shana Weatherbee-Wolfe

Mayor Pro-Tem/ Place 1

Term 1: 5/2020-5/2022

Term 2: 5/2022-5/2024

Term 3: 5/2024-5/2026

Jeff Dickinson

Place 2

Term1: 5/2024-5/2026

Jack Little

Place 3

Term 1: 5/2021-5/2023

Term 2: 5/2023-5/2025

Term 3: 5/2025-5/2027
